summary: Build a 2D Pygame-based racing game app "Jungle Fury: Finish Line" based on the provided code (player car, AI cars, obstacles/rocks, moving finish line, win/lose conditions).
architectural_notes: Use Python + Pygame to implement a 2D racing game: player-controlled car, AI cars, obstacle/rock spawning, collisions, and finish-line win condition.

Current deployment target is a web app (Internet Computer/URL). Android APK/AAB generation and Play Store packaging would require a separate native/mobile build pipeline outside the current deployment flow.
known_issues: Deployment/public launch failing due to invalid domain format (contains ':'; domain must be 5–50 chars and only letters/numbers/hyphens).

existing_features.title: Implement a playable 2D racing/avoidance game in the React (TypeScript) frontend that recreates the core mechanics from the provided Pygame code: player-controlled yellow car on a brown track within a green jungle background; 7 AI cars moving down the track; random falling obstacles (animals/trees) and side rocks; a moving finish line; win/lose conditions.

Add a simple game UI layer around the gameplay area: a title ('Jungle Fury: Finish Line'), an on-screen control hint (e.g., 'Use ← → to steer'), and a status area showing current state (Playing / Game Over / You Won).
Apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, layout) suitable for a jungle racing game and enforce it consistently across all screens/components, avoiding blue/purple as dominant colors.
Add required static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI/game rendering (no backend image routing).
Add an Internet Identity authentication UI to the Jungle Fury game so a user can explicitly sign in and sign out from within the app.
Ensure all user-facing HUD text is in English and remove emoji characters from the main title text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app (runnable game) based on the provided Pygame code for "Jungle Fury: Finish Line"
Provide an Android build (APK/AAB) suitable for Play Store publishing for the Jungle Fury: Finish Line game
